messages.400: Non-Lethal Paralyzer mode. Stun the malformed request and reconstruct.
messages.401: Paralyzer mode. Suppress unauthorized access attempt.
messages.402: Non-Lethal Paralyzer mode. Suspend transaction until verification.
messages.403: Lethal Eliminator mode authorized. Threat level exceeds 300.
messages.404: Paralyzer mode. Search and relocate missing target.
messages.405: Non-Lethal Paralyzer mode. Redirect method approach.
messages.408: Non-Lethal Paralyzer mode. Reset timeout parameters.
messages.409: Paralyzer mode. Isolate and resolve conflict.
messages.410: Destroy Decomposer mode. Target has been permanently eliminated.
messages.413: Paralyzer mode. Compress and reduce payload.
messages.429: Lethal Eliminator mode standby. Reduce request frequency immediately.
messages.500: System diagnostic mode. Sibyl System requires immediate attention.
messages.502: Lethal Eliminator mode standby. Gateway threat assessment in progress.
messages.default: Dominator set to Paralyzer mode. Aim carefully and suppress the target.

descriptions.400: The request format has been deemed incompatible with system protocols. The syntax structure violates established communication standards. Enforcement action: Request reconstruction required.
descriptions.401: Authentication credentials have not been provided or are invalid. The target's identity cannot be verified through Sibyl System protocols. Enforcement action: Credential verification required.
descriptions.402: Payment verification has failed. Economic transaction protocols have not been satisfied. The target must complete financial authorization before proceeding. Enforcement action: Transaction completion required.
descriptions.403: Access to the requested resource has been denied. The target's clearance level is insufficient. Crime coefficient indicates unauthorized access attempt. Enforcement action: Access restriction maintained.
descriptions.404: The requested target has not been found in any sector. Scan results indicate the resource may have been relocated or eliminated. Area enforcement protocols activated. Enforcement action: Target relocation required.
descriptions.405: The requested method has been prohibited by system protocols. The approach violates established communication standards. Enforcement action: Method revision required.
descriptions.406: The requested format is not acceptable. Content negotiation has failed. The target's request cannot be fulfilled in the specified format. Enforcement action: Format adjustment required.
descriptions.408: Request processing has exceeded time limits. The target failed to complete the transaction within allocated timeframe. Enforcement action: Retry with increased priority.
descriptions.409: Data conflict has been detected. The request conflicts with current system state. Multiple enforcement actions are attempting simultaneous modifications. Enforcement action: Conflict resolution required.
descriptions.410: The target has been permanently eliminated from the system. No backup data exists in any sector. The resource has been decomposed beyond recovery. Enforcement action: Accept termination.
descriptions.413: Payload size exceeds system capacity limits. The data transfer violates established protocols. Enforcement action: Payload reduction required.
descriptions.429: Excessive request frequency detected. The target is generating requests at a rate that threatens system stability. Crime coefficient rising. Enforcement action: Request throttling activated.
descriptions.500: Critical system malfunction detected. Sibyl System has encountered an internal error. Enforcement protocols compromised. Enforcement action: System restoration in progress.
descriptions.502: Gateway connection has failed. Communication with upstream systems has been severed. Enforcement action: Gateway re-establishment required.
descriptions.503: Service is currently offline for maintenance. System resources are unavailable. Enforcement action: Standby mode until restoration.
descriptions.504: Gateway response timeout. The upstream system failed to respond within acceptable parameters. Enforcement action: Connection retry required.
descriptions.default: The target's psycho-pass has been analyzed. Enforcement action required.

footers.400: Crime doesn't sleep, and neither does bad syntax.
footers.401: Your psycho-pass has been clouded by lack of credentials.
footers.402: Even in the future, nothing is free.
footers.403: The Sibyl System has deemed you unworthy of access.
footers.404: Not all targets can be found in this dystopia.
footers.405: Wrong method, wrong approach. The Sibyl System judges all.
footers.406: The system only accepts perfect compliance.
footers.408: Time waits for no one, not even the Sibyl System.
footers.409: In a world of order, conflict must be eliminated.
footers.410: Some things, once gone, can never return.
footers.413: Even data has its limits in this controlled society.
footers.429: Calm down. Excessive behavior clouds your psycho-pass.
footers.500: Even the Sibyl System is not infallible.
footers.502: The gateway between worlds has collapsed.
footers.503: The system rests, but enforcement never sleeps.
footers.504: Connection lost in the labyrinth of the network.
footers.default: The law doesn't protect people. People protect the law.
